subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-kjit||happy; pleased}}.

Cantonese sense of “empty” arises from avoidance of {{zh-l|空|hung1}}, which is homophonous to {{zh-l|凶|hung1|inauspicious}}.
